attributes.action: Force airports to allow a grace period for picking up/dropping off passengers.
attributes.additional_details: The amount of time it takes to drop or collect people from the airport is of a very short duration and it only adds to the cost of travel and holidays to impose these ridiculous fees. Just today I see a person penalised £170 after stopping for less than 5 minutes. Moreover, they could only pay on line. This is detrimental to any one without internet capability.
attributes.background: Make it illegal to force people to pay for dropping off and picking up passengers from airports. It is unreasonable to force car drivers/owners to pay a fee for dropping off and picking up passengers from airports when they are only there for less than 20 minutes

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Ban Drop-off charges at airports
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/724381
